mapper.sql: select id,register_num as registerNum, login_num as loginNum ,view_product_num as viewProductNum, create_time as createTime ,phone from user_count_log
mapper.select:
SELECT a.createTime, a.registerNum, f.loginNum, ccl.viewProductNum, c.channelRegisterNum, ifnull(ccl.uv,0) as deviceFlag FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( uc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, SUM( CASE WHEN uc.register_num = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS registerNum FROM user_count_log uc
LEFT JOIN user_record ur ON uc.device_flag=ur.id
and datediff(DATE_FORMAT(uc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),#{startTime}) >=0
and datediff(DATE_FORMAT(uc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),#{endTime}) <=0
GROUP BY createTime ) a LEFT JOIN ( select DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, sum(load_page_num) AS viewProductNum, count( DISTINCT(case when load_page_num=1 then record_id end)) AS uv
from channel_count_log
group by createTime )ccl on ccl.createTime=a.createTime
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, COUNT(0) as channelRegisterNum FROM app_user where a_uphone is not NULL AND channel_id >0 GROUP BY createTime )c ON a.createTime =c.createTime
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT e.createTime as createTime, SUM(case WHEN e.login_num=1 AND e.register_num =1 THEN 1 else 0 END) AS loginNum
FROM (SELECT min(d.createTime) AS createTime, d.login_num , d.register_num , d.phone FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, phone, MAX(login_num) as login_num, MAX(register_num) as register_num
FROM user_count_log
GROUP BY createTime,phone)d GROUP BY d.phone)e GROUP BY e.createTime)f ON a.createTime =f.createTime ORDER BY a.createTime DESC

SELECT a.createTime, a.registerNum, f.loginNum, ccl.viewProductNum, c.channelRegisterNum, ifnull(ccl.uv,0) as deviceFlag, a.channel_id channelId, a.equipment_flag equipmentFlag, ch.channel_name channelName FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( uc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, SUM( CASE WHEN uc.register_num = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS registerNum, au.channel_id,au.equipment_flag FROM user_count_log uc LEFT JOIN user_record ur ON uc.device_flag=ur.id left join app_user au on uc.phone = au.a_uphone GROUP BY createTime,au.channel_id, au.equipment_flag ) a
LEFT JOIN ( select DATE_FORMAT( ccl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, ccl.channel_id,client_type as equipment_flag, sum(load_page_num) AS viewProductNum, count( DISTINCT(case when load_page_num=1 then ifnull(record_id,0) end)) AS uv
from channel_count_log ccl group by createTime,ccl.channel_id,client_type )ccl
on ccl.createTime=a.createTime and ccl.channel_id = a.channel_id and ccl.equipment_flag = a.equipment_flag
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, COUNT(0) as channelRegisterNum, channel_id,equipment_flag FROM app_user where a_uphone is not NULL AND channel_id >0 GROUP BY createTime,channel_id,equipment_flag )c ON a.createTime =c.createTime and c.channel_id = a.channel_id and c.equipment_flag = a.equipment_flag
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.createTime as createTime, SUM(case WHEN e.login_num=1 AND e.register_num =1 THEN 1 else 0 END) AS loginNum, e.equipment_flag,e.channel_id FROM (SELECT min(d.createTime) AS createTime, d.login_num , d.register_num , d.phone, d.equipment_flag,d.channel_id FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT( ucl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime, phone, MAX(login_num) as login_num, MAX(register_num) as register_num, au.equipment_flag,au.channel_id
FROM user_count_log ucl left join app_user au on ucl.phone = au.a_uphone GROUP BY createTime,phone )d
GROUP BY d.phone )e GROUP BY e.createTime,e.equipment_flag,e.channel_id )f ON a.createTime =f.createTime and f.channel_id = a.channel_id and f.equipment_flag = a.equipment_flag
left join channel ch on a.channel_id = ch.channel_id
ORDER BY a.createTime DESC;
